item.title: CentOS 6.2 php-mcrypt and EPEL repo
item.description: You will find plenty of “how-to” tutorials, but usually with not working url to EPEL repo. So this is mine: yum install http://download.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/6/x86_64/epel-release-6-7.noarch.rpm yum update yum install php-mcrypt
